content: * JSE: KAL - CONDENSED CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE SIX MONTHS ENDED 31 MARCH 2023* KAAP AGRI - FIRST SIX MONTHS OF 2023 YEAR WERE DOMINATED BY POOR ECONOMIC CONDITIONS AND ONGOING AND CONTINUOUS HIGH LEVELS OF LOADSHEDDING* KAAP AGRI -HY REVENUE INCREASED BY 68.4% TO R12.09 BILLION, FROM R7.18 BILLION IN PRIOR CORRESPONDING PERIOD* KAAP AGRI -HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE INCREASED BY 11.6% TO 381.09 CENTS PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
